Changing the Job

Now that you are familiar with the job, we will change the example.
  1. Copy the Project or import it again using the name "com.polarion.training.job".
  2. Delete all parameters except "query".
  3. Delete all logic from runInternal(...) except the line:
    1. ITrackerService trackerService = (ITrackerService) PlatformContext.getPlatform().lookupService(ITrackerService.class);
  5. Delete everything from the java files which is not used any longer.
  6. In the runInternal method, add the code to print a comment into the job's logfile.
    1. Use line getLogger().info("<some text>"); to create log comments
    2. The left Parameter in the job is query - insert into the comment the amount of items the query returns.
  8. Start your server, execute the job and confirm that the log contains the correct output.
